meanings.sent1: The ultimated chapter of the book tied up all loose ends.
meanings.sent2: The ultimated decision was made after much deliberation.
meanings.sent3: The ultimated slice of cake was saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The ultimated scene in the movie left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The ultimated goal was achieved after years of hard work.

meanings.definition: To come to a final conclusion or resolution.
meanings.sent1: After hours of discussion, they ultimated their decision.
meanings.sent2: She ultimated her plans for the weekend on Friday.
meanings.sent3: The group ultimated their game night with a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: He ultimated his search for the perfect gift with a handmade present.
meanings.sent5: The team ultimated their strategy for the upcoming match.

meanings.definition: To reach the highest point or degree.
meanings.sent1: The excitement ultimated when the concert began.
meanings.sent2: Her frustration ultimated in a loud outburst.
meanings.sent3: The tension ultimated in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: His dedication ultimated in a promotion at work.
meanings.sent5: Their love ultimated in a beautiful wedding ceremony.
